about_the_game:
Add even more variety to your games with 23 new cards, including 2 corporations. Lead the Asteroid focused Astrodrill corporation– a new kind of resource – or join the Pharmacy Union, and its disease mechanic for expert players. Explore new horizons, broaden your strategies and create even more effective combos with cards such as Meat Industry, rewarding you each time you play an animal card or the almighty Asteroid Deflection System, protecting your plants from your opponent and raining points from above.

The Big Box Promo Pack includes 23 cards:

· 2 new Corporations, Astrodrill playing around the asteroid resource and the expert Pharmacy Union with its unique disease mechanic.

· 18 exciting Projects, focusing on asteroids and adding new combos.

· 3 variants of existing cards to bring them up to date:

  • Deimos Down

  • Great Dam

  • Magnetic Field Generators
